Chicken Boneless ½ kg 

Macaroni (boiled ) ½ packet 

Black Pepper 1 tsp 

Soy Sauce 1 tbsp 

Chili Sauce 2 tbsp 

Oil 2 tbsp 

Ginger Garlic 1 tsp 


Ingredients Of White Sauce: 

Butter 50 gms 

Milk ½ litre 

Plain Flour 1 tbsp 

Black Pepper ½ tsp 

Salt ½ tsp 

Cheddar Cheese 1 cup 

Green Peas 1 cup 

Corns 1 cup

1. In a pan, heat oil add garlic and fry. 

2. When fry well, add black pepper, salt, soy sauce, chili sauce, chili sauce, boiled Macaroni and removes from the stove. 

For White Sauce: 

3. In a pan, heat butter add plain flour and fry. 

4. When aroma comes, add milk, black pepper, salt, green peas, corns and Cheddar Cheese. 

5. Now take it out in a dish, pour white sauce and serve. 

6. Chicken Pasta with cheesy White Sauce is ready.
